Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Interfaces
  • Deprecated Classes
  • Deprecated Enums
  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Enum Constants
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements
  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    xyz.morphia.logging.Logr
    Use Logger directly
    xyz.morphia.logging.LogrFactory
    Use LoggerFactory directly
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    xyz.morphia.AbstractEntityInterceptor
    implement the interface directly
  • Deprecated Enums 
    Enum and Description
    xyz.morphia.MapreduceType
    use MapReduceCommand.OutputType instead
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    xyz.morphia.aggregation.AggregationPipeline.aggregate(String, Class<U>, AggregationOptions, ReadPreference)
    use AggregationPipeline.out(String, Class, AggregationOptions) instead
    xyz.morphia.aggregation.AggregationPipeline.aggregate(String, Class<U>, ReadPreference)
    use AggregationPipeline.out(String, Class) instead
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryImpl.countAll()
    xyz.morphia.query.QueryResults.countAll()
    use QueryResults.count() instead
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.getId(Object)
    xyz.morphia.DatastoreImpl.getKey(T)
    xyz.morphia.Datastore.mapReduce(MapreduceType, Query, Class<T>, MapReduceCommand)
    use Datastore.mapReduce(MapReduceOptions) instead
    xyz.morphia.geo.GeoJson.multiLineString(LineString...)
    use GeoJson.multiLineString(List)
    xyz.morphia.EntityInterceptor.preSave(Object, Document, Mapper)
    use EntityInterceptor.prePersist(Object, Document, Mapper) instead
    xyz.morphia.aggregation.GeoNear.GeoNearBuilder.setUniqueDocuments(Boolean)
    Deprecated since server version 2.6: Geospatial queries no longer return duplicate results. The $uniqueDocs operator has no impact on results.
    xyz.morphia.mapping.validation.MappingValidator.validate(Mapper, MappedClass)
    xyz.morphia.query.Query.where(CodeWScope)
    use #where(CodeWithScope) instead
  • Deprecated Enum Constants 
    Enum Constant and Description
    xyz.morphia.query.FilterOperator.WITHIN
    New in server version 2.4: $geoWithin replaces $within which is deprecated.
  • Deprecated Annotation Type Elements 
    Annotation Type Element and Description
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Reference.concreteClass
    unimplemented
    xyz.morphia.annotations.Property.concreteClass
    this value is currently ignored
